properties.areaDesc: Lower Columbia and I - 5 Corridor in Cowlitz County; Lower Columbia
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 13 at 3:31PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow. New snow accumulations of up to two inches,
heaviest above 500 feet.

* WHERE...In Washington, I-5 Corridor in Cowlitz County. In
Oregon, Lower Columbia.

* WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Roads may become slick, making travel difficult.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow level 500 feet, lowering to near the
valley floor.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST TUESDAY
